front.title: Traversal Using Relays around NAT (TURN) Extension for IPv4/IPv6 Transition

abstract.t: This document defines the REQUESTED-ADDRESS-TYPE attribute for Traversal Using Relays around NAT (TURN). The REQUESTED-ADDRESS-TYPE attribute allows a client to explicitly request the address type the TURN server will allocate (e.g., an IPv4-only node may request the TURN server to allocate an IPv6 address). Additionally, this document also defines a new error response code with the value 440 (Address Family not Supported).
